Html:
I open the solution (with no modifications), add a dinner (with a valid address) and everything works fine.

I re-edit the address field (with a second valid adress) and I get the following error message:

Please correct the errors and try again.

  • A value is required.
  • A value is required.

The address of a dinner cannot be changed.  Has anyone else seen this error and can you perhaps suggest a fix?
